poem:
Title: Exit and Inquiry

Calhoun's sailing from Boeing's worn deck,
Setting sun casting long corporate shadows,
While across the pond, eyes of curiosity
Drill into Alphabet, Apple and Meta's marrow.
A dance of power, a drama of names,
In boardrooms where turbulence prevails,
Underneath the steadfast sky, leadership wanes,
In the unforgiving sea of economic gales.
